song.englishname: Praise The Father, Praise The Son

english.segment1: O sov'reign God, O matchless King-. the saints adore, the angels sing. and fall before the throne on grace. to you belongs the highest praise.
english.segment2: These sufferings, this passing tide. under Your wings I will abide, and every enemy shall flee;. You are my hope and victory.
english.segment3: Praise the Father, Praise the Son. Praise the Spirit, Three in One. Clothed in power and in grace. the name above all other names.
english.segment4: To the valley, for my soul;. Thy great descent has made me whole!. You word my heart has welcomed home;. now peace like water ever flows.
english.segment5: Praise the Father, Praise the Son. Praise the Spirit, Three in One. Clothed in power and in grace. the name above all other names.
english.segment6: Praise the Father, Praise the Son. Praise the Spirit, Three in One. Clothed in power and in grace. the name above all other names.
english.segment7: Yours is the kingdom, yours is the power. Your is the glory forever. Yours is the kingdom, yours is the power. Your is the glory forever.
english.segment8: Praise the Father, Praise the Son. Praise the Spirit, Three in One. Clothed in power and in grace. the name above all other names. The name above all other names.
